%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stparcel_tmp
AS
SELECT
    p.id 
    ,p.lmsid 
    ,p.did 
    ,to_timestamp(p.scandate) as orv_parcel_scandate
    ,p.scanstatus as orv_parcel_scanstatus
	,p.scanmode as orv_parcel_scanmode
	,p.claimid as orv_parcel_claimid
	,p.courierid as orv_parcel_courierid
    ,to_timestamp(p.moddate) as orv_parcel_moddate
    ,d.waybillid

FROM publicparcel p
LEFT JOIN publicdelivery d ON d.did = p.id
WHERE d.mode ='deliver' and D.skipreason != 'Fix wrong data manipulation by the company'

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stparcel_tmp2
AS
SELECT
    p.id as lms_parcel_id
    ,p.OrderID as lms_parcel_orderid
    ,p.ConsignID as lms_parcel_consignid
    ,p.WaybillID as lms_parcel_waybillid
    ,p.LocID as lms_parcel_locid
    ,p.TotCharge as lms_parcel_totcharge
    ,p.DIMMS as lms_parcel_dimms
    ,p.NoOfPcls as lms_parcel_noofpcls
    ,p.PL as lms_parcel_pl
    ,p.PW as lms_parcel_pw
    ,p.PH as lms_parcel_ph
    ,coalesce(p.acceptanceDate,p.handoverdate) as lms_parcel_pdate
    ,p.AcceptanceDate as lms_parcel_acceptancedate
    ,p.Barcode as lms_parcel_barcode
    ,p.VolWeight as lms_parcel_volweight
    ,p.Weight as lms_parcel_weight
    ,p.ChargeWeight as lms_parcel_chargeweight
    ,CASE 
        WHEN (p.ChargeWeight = 0 OR p.ChargeWeight is null) THEN GREATEST((p.weight),(p.VolWeight))
        ELSE p.ChargeWeight 
    END as lms_parcel_pweight
    ,p.PType as lms_parcel_ptype
    ,p.HandOverDate as lms_parcel_handoverdate
    ,p.FloorStatus as lms_parcel_floorstatus
    ,p.ClaimID as lms_parcel_claimid
    ,p.DateVolumised as lms_parcel_datevolumised
    ,p.VolumiserWeight as lms_parcel_volumiserweight
    ,p.VolumiserLength as lms_parcel_volumiserlength
    ,p.VolumiserHeight as lms_parcel_volumiserheight
    ,p.VolumiserWidth as lms_parcel_volumiserwidth
    ,p.Volumiserid as lms_parcel_volumiserid
    ,p.LastUpdate as lms_parcel_lastupdate
    ,o.HODate as lms_parcel_orderhodate
    ,o.PickUpCustID as lms_parcel_orderpickupcustid
    ,o.DeliverCustID as lms_parcel_orderdelivercustid
    ,o.BillCustID as lms_parcel_orderbillcustid
    ,o.specdel as lms_parcel_orderspecdel
    ,o.custaccid as lms_parcel_ordercustaccid
    ,ca.description as lms_parcel_custaccdescription
	,ca.cref as lms_parcel_custacccref
    ,c.CDate as lms_parcel_consignmentcdate
    ,c.DeliverBy as lms_parcel_consignmentdeliverby
    ,w.PODDate  as lms_parcel_waybillpoddate 
    ,w.Date as lms_parcel_waybilldate
    ,pd.id as lms_parcel_parceldetailid
    ,pd.InServiceStart as lms_parcel_parceldetailinservicestart
    ,pd.DeliverBy as lms_parcel_parceldetaildeliverby
    ,pd.ServiceDays as lms_parcel_parceldetailservicedays
    ,pd.ServiceTime as lms_parcel_parceldetailservicetime
    ,pd.Cutofftime as lms_parcel_parceldetailcutofftime
    ,pd.Appointment as lms_parcel_parceldetailappointment
    ,pd.NDDID as lms_parcel_parceldetailnddid
    ,pd.CustOnholdStart as lms_parcel_parceldetailcustonholdstart
    ,pd.CustOnholdEnd as lms_parcel_parceldetailcustonholdend
    ,pd.SplitInitial as lms_parcel_parceldetailsplitinitial
    ,pd.WeekendHolidays as lms_parcel_parceldetailweekendholidays
    ,pd.Inbound as lms_parcel_parceldetailinbound
    ,pd.CourierID as lms_parcel_parceldetailcourierid
    ,pd.ServiceID as lms_parcel_parceldetailserviceid
    ,pd.CustAccID as lms_parcel_parceldetailcustaccid
    ,pd.BrouteMasterID as lms_parcel_parceldetailbroutemasterid
    ,pd.BrouteMasterFromID as lms_parcel_parceldetailbroutemasterfromid
    ,pd.BrouteMasterToID as lms_parcel_parceldetailbroutemastertoid
    ,pd.LeadTimeID as lms_parcel_parceldetailleadtimeid
    ,CASE 
        WHEN pd.id is null and (coalesce(w.PODDate,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) > c.DeliverBy) then 0 
        WHEN coalesce(w.PODDate,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) > pd.DeliverBy then 0 
        ELSE 1 
    END as lms_parcel_inserviceflag
   ,CASE 
        WHEN pd.id is null then (date(coalesce(c.cdate,coalesce(p.acceptanceDate,p.handoverdate)) + interval '86399 seconds'))
        ELSE (pd.InServiceStart)
    END AS lms_parcel_actualleaddaysstartdate
    ,coalesce(w.PODDate,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AS lms_parcel_actualleaddaysenddate
    ,CASE
        WHEN pd.id is null then ((to_unix_timestamp(coalesce(w.PODDate,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP))) - (to_unix_timestamp(date(coalesce(c.cdate,coalesce(p.acceptanceDate,p.handoverdate))) + interval '86399 seconds')))/86400 
        ELSE ((to_unix_timestamp(coalesce(w.PODDate,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP))) - (to_unix_timestamp(pd.InServiceStart)))/86400 
    END as lms_parcel_actualleaddaysinclwe
    ,pt.orv_parcel_scandate
    ,pt.orv_parcel_scanstatus
	,pt.orv_parcel_scanmode
	,pt.orv_parcel_claimid
	,pt.orv_parcel_courierid
    ,pt.orv_parcel_moddate
    ,CASE
        WHEN pd.id is null then to_timestamp((cast(to_date(c.DeliverBy,'yyyy-MM-dd') as string)||' 23:59:59.999'))
        ELSE to_timestamp((cast(to_date(pd.DeliverBy,'yyyy-MM-dd') as string)||' 23:59:59.999'))
    END as lms_parcel_parceldetaildeliverbyroundup
    ,CASE
        WHEN pd.id is null then (to_unix_timestamp(coalesce(w.PODDate,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) - to_unix_timestamp(to_timestamp((cast(to_date(c.DeliverBy,'yyyy-MM-dd') as string)||' 23:59:59.999')))) 
        ELSE (to_unix_timestamp(coalesce(w.PODDate,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) - to_unix_timestamp(to_timestamp((cast(to_date(pd.DeliverBy,'yyyy-MM-dd') as string)||' 23:59:59.999')))) 
    END as parcelagedifferenceinseconds
    
FROM sstparcelunion p
LEFT JOIN stparcel_tmp pt on pt.lmsid = p.id AND pt.waybillid = p.waybillid
LEFT JOIN dboorder o on p.orderid = o.id
LEFT JOIN sstconsignmentunion c on p.consignid = c.id
LEFT JOIN dbowaybill w on p.waybillid = w.ID
LEFT JOIN dboparceldetail pd on p.id = pd.parcelid
LEFT JOIN dbocustacc ca on ca.id = o.custaccid
WHERE  coalesce(p.acceptanceDate,p.handoverdate) IS NOT NULL
AND p.locid NOT IN (163,110,213,27)

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stparcel_tmp3
AS
SELECT 
    p.lms_parcel_id
    ,sum(holiday)*86400 as holidays
FROM stparcel_tmp2 p
INNER JOIN dboweekendholiday h on (date(h.DateHoliday) >=  date(lms_parcel_actualleaddaysstartdate) and date(h.DateHoliday) <= date(lms_parcel_actualleaddaysenddate))
GROUP BY p.lms_parcel_id

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stparcel_tmp4
AS
SELECT 
    p.*
    ,(to_unix_timestamp(p.lms_parcel_actualleaddaysenddate) - to_unix_timestamp(p.lms_parcel_actualleaddaysstartdate) - coalesce(p1.holidays,0))/86400 as lms_parcel_actualleaddays
FROM stparcel_tmp2 p
LEFT JOIN stparcel_tmp3 p1 on p1.lms_parcel_id = p.lms_parcel_id

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stparcel_tmp5
AS
SELECT 
    *
    ,CASE 
        WHEN lms_parcel_parceldetaildeliverby is null THEN 'Not Consigned'
        WHEN lms_parcel_waybillpoddate is null THEN 'Not Delivered'
        WHEN (parcelagedifferenceinseconds/3600) < 12 THEN '< 12 hrs'
        WHEN (parcelagedifferenceinseconds/3600) < 24 THEN '< 24 hrs'
        WHEN (parcelagedifferenceinseconds/3600) < 48 THEN '< 2 days'
        WHEN (parcelagedifferenceinseconds/3600) < 72 THEN '< 3 days'
        WHEN (parcelagedifferenceinseconds/3600) < 96 THEN '< 4 days'
        WHEN (parcelagedifferenceinseconds/3600) < 120 THEN '< 5 days'
        WHEN (parcelagedifferenceinseconds/3600) < 144 THEN '< 6 days'
        WHEN (parcelagedifferenceinseconds/3600) < 168 THEN '< 7 days'
        WHEN (parcelagedifferenceinseconds/3600) > 168 THEN '> 7 days'
        ELSE NULL
    END as lms_parcel_age

FROM stparcel_tmp4

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stparcel_tmp6
AS
SELECT 
     p.*
    ,v.lms_track_enddate
    ,v.lms_track_floortimeend
    ,v.lms_track_fromlocid
    ,(to_unix_timestamp(p.lms_parcel_consignmentcdate)-to_unix_timestamp(p.lms_parcel_pdate)) as lms_parcel_pdatetocdate
    ,(to_unix_timestamp(v.lms_track_enddate)-to_unix_timestamp(p.lms_parcel_consignmentcdate)) as lms_parcel_cdatetoenddate
    ,(to_unix_timestamp(v.lms_track_enddate)-to_unix_timestamp(p.lms_parcel_pdate)) as lms_parcel_startdatetoenddate
    ,(to_unix_timestamp(v.lms_track_floortimeend)-to_unix_timestamp(v.lms_track_enddate)) as lms_parcel_floortimeedndtoenddate
    ,(to_unix_timestamp(p.lms_parcel_waybillpoddate)-to_unix_timestamp(v.lms_track_floortimeend)) as lms_parcel_deliveryduration
    
  
FROM stparcel_tmp5 p
LEFT JOIN stvsmparcel v ON v.lms_track_parcelid = p.lms_parcel_id

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stparcelsplitconsign_1
AS
SELECT 
p.lms_parcel_orderid
,p.lms_parcel_consignid
FROM
stparcel_tmp6 p

GROUP BY
p.lms_parcel_orderid,
p.lms_parcel_consignid

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stparcelsplitconsign_2
AS
SELECT 
p.lms_parcel_orderid
,CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS lms_parcel_splitconsignmentflag


FROM
stparcelsplitconsign_1 p

GROUP BY
p.lms_parcel_orderid

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stparcelsplitdeliver_1
AS
SELECT
p.lms_parcel_orderid
,p.lms_parcel_waybillid
FROM
stparcel_tmp6 p

GROUP BY
p.lms_parcel_orderid
,p.lms_parcel_waybillid

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stparcelsplitdeliver_2
AS
SELECT 
p.lms_parcel_orderid
,CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS lms_parcel_splitdeliveredflag

FROM
stparcelsplitdeliver_1 p

GROUP BY
p.lms_parcel_orderid

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stparcel
AS
SELECT 
p.*
,c.lms_parcel_splitconsignmentflag
,d.lms_parcel_splitdeliveredflag
FROM
stparcel_tmp6 p

LEFT JOIN stparcelsplitconsign_2 c ON p.lms_parcel_orderid = c.lms_parcel_orderid
LEFT JOIN stparcelsplitdeliver_2 d ON p.lms_parcel_orderid = d.lms_parcel_orderid
